text:
Hey everyone! I’m introducing *<https://playswivel.com|Swivel>*, an interactive spin-to-win Slack app! :exploding_head: Swivel allows your team to celebrate wins, helps boost team morale, and creates fun for everyone! :hyperspinthink:

You control the odds, the prizes, and the excitement! You can trigger Swivels for anything from random fun to closing deals to anything in between. Ready to get started? It’s free. :fire:
